name: Whoops!
description:
In this game you play a scientist starting out at their new job!  You'll get to choose between two routes, one where you study Physics and Reality, and another where you study AI!  The game takes place over the course of several weeks, and you get to choose a new assignment each week!

This game is currently early in development, a placeholder ending is provided.  Currently the content for Weeks 1 and 2 of the AI route are available, Weeks 3-5 for AI as well as 1-5 for Physics and Reality are in progress.  Expect large edits to existing content, as well art and music in future updates.

(At present not running on Firefox, but working on Chrome)
